message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $16,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate you getting back to me and understanding the value of this product. While $16,000 reflects its worth, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $13,000?
I understand the value of the product, Alice, but I am still aiming to keep the price within my budget. Could we agree on $12,000?
